skills.desc:
Places a 15% [Reflect Damage] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
Has an 85% chance of placing a 15% [Reflect Damage] buff on a random ally for 2 turns.
Also has a 35% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff on 2 random enemies for 1 turn.
